      • setExcludeList

        public static void setExcludeList(java.lang.String[] arr)
        Defines a list of strings as exclude criteria for logging events. A logging event is suppressed if its message contains one of the exclude list elements.
        Parameters:
        arr - String[] array of exclude criteria
